```{r setup}
library(htmlwidgets)
library(htmltools)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflethex)
library(stats)
```

```{r}
df <- tibble(
  lat = stats::rnorm(100),
  lng = stats::rnorm(100),
  size = runif(100, 5, 20),
  color = sample(colors(), 100)
)

df2 <- tibble(
  lat =  42.9634 + stats::rnorm(100),
  lng = -85.6681 + stats::rnorm(100),
  size = runif(100, 5, 20),
  color = sample(colors(), 100)
)


leaflet::leaflet(df) %>% 
  leaflet::addTiles() %>% 
  leaflethex::add_hexbin(
    radius = 19, 
    lowEndColor = "yellow", 
    highEndColor="red",
    stroke = FALSE)
leaflet::leaflet(df2) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  leaflethex::add_hexbin(
    data = df2,
    radius = 19, 
    lowEndColor = "lightblue", 
    highEndColor="purple",
    stroke = TRUE)
```
